item.title: Adding teleporting emote when teleporting request
item.dc:creator: @nightgaming nightgaming
item.description:
@nightgaming wrote:

well i am in need of help i have been trying to add teleport emote so when i teleport it dose the emote and almost teleports u. this is what i have so far

     } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("lummy")) {
        if (teleblock == true) {
            sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by night
        } else {
            teleportToX = 3225;
            teleportToY = 3220;
            sendMessage(
                    "You teleport to the new home.");
        }  


        case 4140:
            if (teleblock == true) { // Made by night
                sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); 
            } else {
                customCommand("lummy"); // made by night
            }
            break;

please help me
